splitTerminals.name: front
commands: sleep 10s && cd frontend && npm run dev

splitTerminals.name: back-compiler
commands: sleep 9s && cd backend && npm run dev

splitTerminals.name: back-server
commands: sleep 8s && cd backend && npm run serve

splitTerminals.name: temp-bash
commands: xdotool key '^{PGUP}' && xdotool key '^+j' && xdotool key 'blue~'
xdotool key '^{PGUP}' && xdotool key '^+j' && xdotool key 'red~'
xdotool key '^{PGUP}' && xdotool key '^+j' && xdotool key 'green~'
xdotool key '^{PGUP}' && xdotool key '^+j' && xdotool key 'cyan~'
